Task-2-2_key2: Joh number 2 se divisible hote hai woh even number kehlate hai.
Task-2-2_key4:
Apko ish task meh koi bi ek number diya jayega uske piche ke 3 even number nikalo.
Jab yeh nikal jaye toh uske aage ke 3 odd number nikalo.
Task-2-2_key6: Apne program ko test karne ke liye ish input ko dale ke uske output check kare
